forecast.day_comments: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 35. Light and variable wind.
forecast.night_comments: Snow, possibly mixed with sleet, becoming all snow after 3am.  Low around 30. Calm wind becoming southeast 5 to 8 mph in the evening. Winds could gust as high as 22 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow and sleet accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
